name: Dirty Truck Drive
description:
Become an offroad car driver in this exciting new like truck simulation game. Get in your offroad car and deliver cargo to your destination. All off road cars are new and high speed. These hill cars are not so heavy like off road trucks, trailers and other heavy machinery in other off road games. So test your all driving skills in this new hilux game.

Features:
- Ultra realistic 3D graphics.
- Innovative 3D camera angles.
- Smooth controller.
- Difficult curvy tracks and mountain rocks.
- Detailed Range of stunts in uphill tracks.
- Ultra High Definition display.
